name: Li-Ming
title: Rebellious Wizard
description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 more damage.

heroics.name: Disintegrate
heroics.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroics.name: Wave Of Force
heroics.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

original.name: Li-Ming
original.title: Rebellious Wizard
original.description: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?
original.shortDescription: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.

baseHeroInfo.name: Li-Ming
baseHeroInfo.title: Rebellious Wizard
baseHeroInfo.description: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?
baseHeroInfo.shortDescription: A high burst damage Mage who can reset her Abilities upon getting a takedown.

role.name: Assassin
role.description: Assassin Slayers of Heroes and bringers of pain.

trait.name: Critical Mass
trait.description: Getting a Takedown will refresh the cooldown on all of Li-Ming's Abilities.

abilities.name: Magic Missiles
abilities.description: Fire three missiles toward an area, each dealing 147 damage to the first enemy hit. These missiles do 50% damage to Structures.

abilities.name: Arcane Orb
abilities.description: Fire an Orb that powers up as it travels, dealing 135 damage to the first enemy hit. Damage is increased the further it travels, up to 270 more damage.

heroicAbilities.name: Disintegrate
heroicAbilities.description: Channel a powerful beam, dealing 440 damage over 2.5 seconds to enemies while they are in it. The direction of the beam changes with your mouse cursor position.

heroicAbilities.name: Wave Of Force
heroicAbilities.description: Knock away all enemies from an area and deal 160 damage.

otherAbilities.name: Archon: Pure Power
otherAbilities.description: Activate to enter Archon form, allowing Li-Ming to repeatedly use Disintegrate, but be unable to cast other Abilities.

skins.name: Rebellious Wizard
skins.description: The derogatory moniker "wizard" is often given to mages with rebellious attitudes or an obsession with power. Li-Ming displays a little of both and she's hardly ashamed of it. After all, who are they to judge a wielder of limitless arcane magic?

skins.name: Archon Li-Ming
skins.description: Once, only wizards who had spent countless hours braving the inferno were able to attain the fabled archon armor. Those who adorned it were both respected and feared. Then came transmog...

skins.name: Lunar Li-Ming
skins.description: To Li-Ming, the Lunar Festival of the Nexus was not so dissimilar from those of her homeland, Xiansai. Donning her favored finery, she joined in celebration with a nostalgic joy.

skins.name: Striker Li-Ming
skins.description: Li-Ming is an avid student of magic, but it was her skills on the court that scored her a scholarship at the Yshari Sanctum. As team captain, she intends to lead the Vizjerei Fireflies to victory.

skins.name: Star Queen Li-Ming
skins.description: All seemed lost as the star princesses fell one after another. But Li-Mingâ€™s refusal to give up hope awakened a new power inside her, transforming her into the legendary Star Queen.

skins.name: Star Princess Li-Ming
skins.description: For eons, Earth has been protected by the magical Star Princesses. Together, they stand against the evil Eternal Empire and its Space Lords in the name of love and friendship.
